author: absolute through äлёша
definition: Dimensional analysis of social role dynamics and interpersonal interactions - mapping collective human behavior patterns through geometric reduction of archetypal social functions

cyclic_patterns: Всегда живёт в своём ритме (Personal rhythm)

engagement_styles: Владеет лично и по праву (Personal ownership)
Берегёт то что считает своим (Protective of resources)

0D_entities.evidence: Each social role represents discrete functional position in collective system

role_transitions.developmental_paths: Page → Knight → King progression showing social maturation
role_transitions.influence_flows: Leadership roles → Operational roles → Support functions
role_transitions.temporal_sequences: Day planning → Week cycles → Month strategies → Quarter objectives

interaction_vectors.command_chains: Authority flows from Kings/Queens through Knights to support roles
interaction_vectors.information_flows: Intelligence gathering, processing, and distribution through role hierarchy
interaction_vectors.resource_movements: Material and social capital allocation through network connections

1D_vectors.evidence: Social roles interact through directional influence and resource flows

role_relationship_matrices.authority_structure: Hierarchical relationships between leadership, operational, and support levels
role_relationship_matrices.conflict_dynamics: Tension patterns between competing interests and approaches

temporal_coordination.planning_matrices: Integration of different time horizons across roles
temporal_coordination.synchronization_patterns: Coordination of individual rhythms into collective timing
temporal_coordination.adaptive_cycles: How role constellation adjusts to changing temporal demands

communication_networks.information_topology: Who communicates with whom and through what channels
communication_networks.feedback_loops: How information and influence circulate through role system

2D_planes.evidence: Social roles form systematic 2D interaction matrices with stable relationship patterns

complete_social_system.integrated_collective: All roles working together as coherent social organism
complete_social_system.adaptive_organization: System adjusts role activation based on situational needs
complete_social_system.emergent_intelligence: Collective problem-solving capacity exceeding individual capabilities

social_metabolism.function: Complete system for processing collective challenges and opportunities
social_metabolism.resource_circulation: Efficient distribution of material, informational, and social capital
social_metabolism.homeostatic_regulation: Maintenance of social stability while enabling growth and adaptation

cultural_field.shared_meaning: Common understanding of role functions and relationships
cultural_field.collective_identity: Group sense of purpose and belonging
cultural_field.evolutionary_potential: Capacity for collective learning and development

3D_fields.evidence: Complete social field integrates all roles into unified collective intelligence

social_meta_awareness.function: Conscious understanding of role dynamics and collective patterns
social_meta_awareness.system_observation: Ability to see social system as integrated whole rather than collection of individuals
social_meta_awareness.strategic_coordination: Optimizing role relationships for enhanced collective effectiveness

role_flexibility.perspective: Understanding multiple role capacities within oneself and others
role_flexibility.adaptive_leadership: Activating appropriate role based on collective needs
role_flexibility.developmental_mentorship: Supporting others' growth into fuller role capacity

collective_consciousness.group_intelligence: Accessing collective wisdom beyond individual knowledge
collective_consciousness.systemic_healing: Addressing dysfunctional patterns at social system level
collective_consciousness.evolutionary_participation: Conscious contribution to collective human development

4D_spectator.evidence: Meta-social awareness enables conscious optimization of collective intelligence and effectiveness

Король (King).function: Центр системы, держит всё в всех, высшая степень зрелости
Король (King).characteristics: Централизует систему, удерживает баланс, действует ради общего

Королева (Queen).characteristics: Extends influence, creates cultural field, nurtures collective
Королева (Queen).interaction_style: Influential through inspiration and cultural creation

Другой Король (Other King).characteristics: Provides balance, alternative approaches, checks and balances

Рыцарь (Knight).function: Альтруист - действует ради другого ради энергию вперёд
Рыцарь (Knight).interaction_style: Heroic action in service of others

Дама (Lady).function: Эгоист - заботится о своём, держит форму и ритм
Дама (Lady).characteristics: Self-care as service, maintains standards and culture
Дама (Lady).interaction_style: Leading through example and maintaining quality

Паж (Page).function: Социопат - собирает информацию, смотрит со стороны
Паж (Page).characteristics: Information gathering, outside perspective, social intelligence
Паж (Page).temporal_focus: Immediate social dynamics and information processing

interaction_dynamics.authority_flows: Kings/Queens → Knights/Ladies → Support roles → Collective outcomes
interaction_dynamics.information_circulation: Pages gather → Knights act → Ladies refine → Kings/Queens integrate
interaction_dynamics.resource_allocation: Leadership determines → Operations implement → Support sustains
interaction_dynamics.feedback_integration: Results inform → Leadership adjusts → System evolves
interaction_dynamics.conflict_resolution: Different temporal orientations require coordination and compromise
interaction_dynamics.collective_learning: Individual role development enhances overall system capacity

coherence_patterns.hierarchical_coherence: Clear authority relationships enable effective coordination
coherence_patterns.temporal_coherence: Different time horizons integrate into comprehensive planning
coherence_patterns.functional_coherence: All roles contribute essential capacities to collective success
coherence_patterns.adaptive_coherence: System maintains identity while responding to changing conditions

practical_applications.organizational_design: Creating role structures that maximize collective intelligence
practical_applications.team_composition: Ensuring all essential social functions are represented
practical_applications.leadership_development: Growing individuals into fuller role capacity
practical_applications.conflict_resolution: Understanding role-based tensions and finding integration
practical_applications.cultural_evolution: Conscious development of collective social capacity
practical_applications.community_building: Designing sustainable social systems with clear role relationships

reduction_examples.raw: Individual identifying strongly with Knight archetype

reduction.evidence: Discrete social role as organizing principle for behavior

reduction_examples.raw: Command flowing from King through Knight to support functions

reduction.evidence: Directional flow of authority through role hierarchy

reduction_examples.raw: Conscious coordination of all role functions for enhanced collective effectiveness

system_coherence_metrics.role_clarity: How well individuals understand their social function
system_coherence_metrics.authority_legitimacy: Acceptance and effectiveness of leadership roles
system_coherence_metrics.adaptive_capacity: System's ability to evolve and respond to challenges

integration_with_cfo.principle: Social role dynamics represent 2D→3D collective organization patterns with 4D conscious coordination potential
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Social meta-awareness enables field + dimension = spectator transition in collective intelligence
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious social patterns into conscious collective effectiveness
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding role dynamics maximizes collective intelligence and social harmony
